website_summaries.verdict: The most lightweight option on our list, this versatile moisturizer with SPF is great for sheer-to-medium coverage.
pros: Oil-free but effectively moisturizing, this SPF-packed foundation works great for easy, every day use when you don't have time to apply a full face of make up

customer_reviews.title: Greatest Tinted Foundation Out There!
customer_reviews.text: I discovered Bare Minerals a few years ago and have become a dedicated customer of most of their products (except eye shadow & mascara.) Their skin care products are really good. I have average skin, and am in my 50's. Product goes on nicely, easy to get even and doesn't settle in skin creases. Coverage is good, you don't have to use a lot, and I like that it has an SPF component to it. I've used it a couple years now, will continue to unless they come out with something better!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this product!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best products I have used. The color is perfect for my skin tone (wheat 4.5). It goes on easily, is light weight, and hydrating. I would put this product at light to maybe light/medium coverage. It covers any redness or uneven skin tone. It even helps to cover most of my under eye darkness. It is my regular, everyday foundation. The SPF is nice a nice added bonus as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great lightweight and natural looking coverage
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this at BareMinerals so they helped me find the right shade. However the price is way better here then it is at BareMinerals or Sephora and more convenient to buy. I have never been one to wear foundation or much makeup so I was looking for something lightweight and natural looking. This is seriously perfect. You can’t even tell you have makeup on and it provides just enough coverage to even out your skin tone. I like that it has spf too. I still put some extra concealer on if needed and it blends great. Very happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Zakk & Steph

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear medium beige powder and the wheat color works very well.
customer_reviews.author: curly sue

customer_reviews.title: This is the only foundation I will use.
customer_reviews.text: This is my absolute favorite foundation. I use it with one layer of moisturizer underneath. I let the moisturizer completely dry first and then I apply this. When I’m done I do a few touch ups with the powder foundation and set with Urban Decay setting spray. Lasts all day and looks natural!
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Orange tint, works decent, can find something cheaper of same quality
customer_reviews.text: This product was just ok. I am pretty fair and tried to get one of the lightest colors, but it still had a very orange-y tint to it. It did provide light coverage for redness, blemishes, etc. It is a bit tacky to apply, gel is a better word than tinted moisturizer. However, for the price it wasn't really worth it. I bought a $5 covergirl tinted moisturizer that I liked better than this, so $20 for an ok product probably won't be a repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mallory B

customer_reviews.title: Not what I hoped it would be
customer_reviews.text: i stopped using bare minerals because as we get older it settles into fine lines and pores. so i thought liquid would be better. this was just as bad. Also I ordered the wrong color. I followed the chart on their website, but I this makes me look pale. great ... pale and wrinkled... wish I could send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I’ll never go back to foundation.
customer_reviews.text: I *love* this product. I don’t wear a ton of makeup and this feels like suntan lotion for your face, as opposed to heavy foundation. It’s perfect for the summer — really lightweight, and the tint doesn’t melt or rub off in the heat. I’m also very, very fair so I’m always nervous about anything tinted, but this color is just enough. Very subtle. I’m definitely a convert.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Norton

customer_reviews.title: My Miracle Tinted Moisturizer!
customer_reviews.text: This is my absolute go to! Out of all the products in my cosmetic bag, this is my absolute favorite. It’s lightweight, it feels wonderful on my face, it provides great coverage and it’s long lasting. I love that it has the flexibility to wear as a stand alone or I can polish on some of my bare pro on top for a fuller coverage. You will not be disappointed, I promise!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great Product Plus Sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: Love this hydrating cream. Spreads well, looks great. I use it with BareMinerals powder. Great combination! I have had skin cancer a few times, one on my nose that was horrible, so really appreciate the fact that this contains sunscreen in it.
customer_reviews.author: Goldielocks512

customer_reviews.title: Bought 2
customer_reviews.text: I like it a lot! Easy to put on and take of and have SPF my sister “borrowed” the one I previously bought so I got another one! 2 sisters approved! Ps this NOT a full coverage foundation it just give you a little blurring effects but isn’t going to cover anything :)
customer_reviews.author: Rada

customer_reviews.title: LOVE Complexion Rescue
customer_reviews.text: Great product. The Complexion Rescue Tinted Cream gives a slight coverage, does not pill, stays on all day and is not greasy. I am light skinned and like a natural look. This is not heavy mat-finish coverage. I am sold on this.
customer_reviews.author: Char

customer_reviews.title: Very greasy - no color tint.
customer_reviews.text: Contacted customer service because it moisturizes extremely well but there is no color tint and my face broke out. I jut read of others having same issue. I usually purchase Sephora with no issue. Probably a knock off or bad batch (they claim no). I will not be buying beauty products off amazon ever Again.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Gregory

customer_reviews.title: light coverage, not heavy
customer_reviews.text: This is a tinted moisturizer face makeup. I started using this years ago and enjoy the fact that it is not excessively heavy like a lot of makeup, and has sunscreen in it. it's a bit expensive for my budget, but I purchase it anyway.
customer_reviews.author: clariseb

customer_reviews.title: Favorite affordable tinted mositurizer!
customer_reviews.text: I had to stop using my favorite Laura Mercier tinted mositurizer bc it was just too expensive. Tried a few cheap brands and could seriously tell the difference in quality. This stuff is just about as good as the stuff that costs twice as much. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Johnson

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this instead of heavy foundation!
customer_reviews.text: This tinted cream is a wonderful alternative to full coverage foundation. It is not cakey or too heavy, yet it covers just enough.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Great for every day wear
customer_reviews.text: Great for every day wear. I get compliments on my skin when I have this on. Looks like there is nothing on. I wear spf 35 under it just to be safe but there is already spf 30 in it which is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Shan

customer_reviews.title: Good for mature skin
customer_reviews.text: I say it’s good for mature skin because it has a nice light coverage and does not have a tendency to creep into the fine lines as foundations do on me. I have been wearing Bare Minerals with several years now.
customer_reviews.author: Kathi Greyhosky

customer_reviews.title: Go to
customer_reviews.text: This is a good tinted moisturizer. It ha great coverage and buildable. It works well on my oily skin even if I don’t set it with powder. It lasts well and doesn’t settle too much into lines.
customer_reviews.author: Crys

customer_reviews.title: Light Coverage, No Cake
customer_reviews.text: This is a miracle make up. Light coverage without being cakey - you glow a little and people frequently think I’m not wearing any make up it looks so natural. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Color match
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I am not a huge fan of foundation. I dislike the way it typically looks. I’m 38 years old. I have fine lines and dry skin. It doesn’t cake or settle into my lines. It’s feels like moisturizer with a tint as described. The color is perfect and it can layer up for more coverage. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jessi

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight & moisture in place of coverage, not okay
customer_reviews.text: Yes it’s moisturizing and lightweight. But I’m not willing to trade those in for coverage. Zero coverage regardless of amount used. First product in this line of makeup that I don’t like. I actually question how it had positive reviews to start. Makes no sense.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: What happened?
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always used this and for some reason this time it’s not the same. My entire face is broken out in bumps which is why I switched to this years ago because it didn’t make me break out! Disappointed :( I don’t know what could have went wrong...
customer_reviews.author: Sierra Frazier

customer_reviews.title: Good All Around Tinted SPF
customer_reviews.text: I really like this stuff because it covers up flaws but isn't heavy. I also don't need to use powder with it, and it has the SPF of 30, which I always like to wear when I go outside. I will say it isn't very moisturizing though. I think it's a choice between light weight or moisturizing sometimes. Moisturizers can get greasy and heavy pretty easily.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie MacDonald

customer_reviews.title: Just what I've been looking for
customer_reviews.text: Lucky me...I'm an older lady who is fortunate to have great skin for my age. Still, needed a product that doesn't settle into wrinkles and make my skin look heavy and made-up. It nicely covers any small blemishes and color I chose was a great match for my skin tone.
customer_reviews.author: Betty  J.

customer_reviews.title: Squirted out of the tube!
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this product but when it was delivered and I opened it for the first time, it squirted out everywhere!! The tube must have been under a lot of pressure when it shipped because I lost probably half of the product as soon as I opened it-- just spurted right out and wouldn't stop! Very disappointing :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Always my favorite
customer_reviews.text: This has been my favorite. I love it because you can go for a more natural look and feel beautiful, it works best with their face powder it helps to cover up those blemishes the BB cream doesn’t. This is not a super heavy cream it is very light.
customer_reviews.author: Emily anderson

customer_reviews.title: Love this! Light weight, feels and looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Love this!!! I've been using primetime under my foundation powder, but it seemed to dry out my skin. So I tried this product and I love it! Very easy to apply and a nice light feel, not heavy or caking. My skin feels great all day! Thanks!!!
customer_reviews.author: Errolyn Martin

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite makeup!
customer_reviews.text: This product was recommended by a friend after I complimented her makeup. Have been very happy with every aspect of this makeup. Will continue buying
customer_reviews.author: Nena

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: It's light coverage, but it's undetectable. Just gives a little bit of finish to your face.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, gives a healthy glow, doesn’t show wrinkles
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight with moderate coverage. It evens out my skin tone but doesn’t look caked on ever, it gives me a nice healthy glow. This is a great foundation for women who are closing in on 40 and are stating to get those pesky wrinkles.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: It’s a bit more of a dewy finish than I like, but I matte it with Bare Minerals Under ...
customer_reviews.text: This makeup has improved my complexion. It’s a bit more of a dewy finish than I like, but I matte it with Bare Minerals Under and Over powder. I hope they never stop making this foundation.
customer_reviews.author: Shanteuse

customer_reviews.title: Great Light Makeup
customer_reviews.text: Love this for light makeup. It feels and looks like I'm not wearing any but helps a lot with hiding redness and dark circles. I also feel good about wearing it in the summer because of the spf. I usually buy it at sephora but it's nice to have it ship really quickly from Amazon when I need it.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Its exactly what I wanted. I have gotten this in Sephora have really liked it. Will order again.
customer_reviews.author: JulesC

customer_reviews.title: Love this product for my face
customer_reviews.text: Love this product for my face. Once you get the right color, it smooths your face without looking like you have makeup on. Very nice!
customer_reviews.author: Airie

customer_reviews.title: Sheer and light, but covered redness
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Very sheer light coverage. Perfect for on the go makeup. Wasn’t positive what shade to get but it’s so sheer that you can’t notice. I think I got a good shade. It does reduce the color of redness on the face!
customer_reviews.author: sarah p

customer_reviews.title: Good color, lightweight, stays put
customer_reviews.text: This is the best match for a tinted moisturizer I have found! It is super light weight and doesn’t bead up when I have gotten really hot out in the summer heat.
customer_reviews.author: Carly

customer_reviews.title: My fav!
customer_reviews.text: I love that it's not heavyweight but a good amount of coverage. A glowy finish and lasts a while. I've bought multiple times and will continue to.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Great product but the bottle is only half full
customer_reviews.text: I love this makeup, it's the best for my skin and it's so light. BUT when you first get the bottle you think it's full and after about two weeks of using it, a puff of air comes out and the bottle shows it's half as full as you think. It doesn't take much with each use to cover your face so it should last twice as long as it does.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Truman

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I've used this for years and I will never switch to anything else. It's not tested on animals and it's environmentally friendly. It covers up my spots and makes me look dewy; I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: CAKEY
customer_reviews.text: Way too heavy for me. This was cakey and made my face look oily.
customer_reviews.author: tara hill

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!!
customer_reviews.text: Best natural moisturizer with SPF out there- I love it so much, and wish amazon would stock it all the time!!
customer_reviews.author: Abigail

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I prefer the no makeup/barely any makeup look and this tinted moisturizer has blown me away! It goes on so smoothly and covers redness pretty well. It’s definitely a light to medium coverage but for a busy working mom like me, it’s essential to my morning routine!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for someone looking for light easy coverage as part of their morning routine. Stays even better if you put a printer underneath, and no issues with breakouts.
customer_reviews.author: K S

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great! Very lightweight and still gives a good coverage!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My wife swears that this is the only thing that works for her.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew K.

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Great if you don’t like wearing full coverage. Makes my skin so glowy! Have tried many similar products with steeper price points and this one is the best. Great shade range! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: kjo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent lightweight foundation
customer_reviews.text: Love this bare minerals. The price is excellent compared to retail stores.
customer_reviews.author: LittleBird

customer_reviews.title: Works, easy and good price
customer_reviews.text: This makeup goes up easy and very light. It matched my skin perfectly and it great for days you don’t want to put all your makeup on but still don’t want to walk around without anything
customer_reviews.author: Nelson4

customer_reviews.title: Buy it.
customer_reviews.text: Such a better price then local makeup stores. Worth the purchase. Never buying from the local stores again.
customer_reviews.author: Asheley Boudreau

customer_reviews.title: My New Favorite
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. I like some coverage but don't want to "look" like I have a lot of makeup on. This is nourishing to my older/dryer skin and looks natural. Will definitely be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: S. L. Greenlow

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. Mixes even with water, always refreshes my skin.
customer_reviews.text: 100% the best tone which I found in States to replace my european ones.
customer_reviews.author: Lara Z.

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. Light weight and it seems to color adjust over the first hour I wear it. Looks like my own skin. I also wear a lose powder over it. I will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: It dries on the skin, not moisture enough if you have dry skin. Light coverage, very mild smell.
customer_reviews.author: Ekaterina

customer_reviews.title: A little too "moist" for me.
customer_reviews.text: The "luminous" quality of this is too much for me. It makes my face look more oily than moist but some customers may like this quality.
customer_reviews.author: M. Straney

customer_reviews.title: Neutral undertone, nice coverage
customer_reviews.text: Many fair foundation or tinted moisturizer shades go orange or salmon on me and this one has a true neutral undertone. Nice medium coverage, perfect for everyday and going to work. I'll be repurchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Becci Martinson

customer_reviews.title: Good but has a slight opaque/matte look
customer_reviews.text: I like the way it feels, but does not look as natural as I'd like.
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: So-so
customer_reviews.text: I am so-so with this product. Not very smooth going on
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My fav
customer_reviews.text: My all time favorite product .. I use it daily .. takes a really small amount .. I use it with bare minerals primer .. this is my second tube.. for my oily/combination/acne prone breakout skin - this one soothes well..
customer_reviews.author: Debanjali Banerjee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like. I would say go darker on color. It rubs in really good n lightens up.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Makin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My new favorite. I get compliments on my complexion since I started using it.
customer_reviews.author: Dayle

customer_reviews.title: Fake?
customer_reviews.text: I don’t think this is a legit product. Coverage and finish are not like the stuff you get from Ulta or Bare Minerals directly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good pore cover
customer_reviews.text: Came next day. I’ve bought this in store before so I already knew which shade to buy. I love the light coverage and it lasts forever
customer_reviews.author: Hazel P.

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: I use this all the time instead of foundation. Goes on light.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Girlfriend loves this stuff
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what to say about it, my girlfriend loves it though.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: Good quality with the price. This is my second time ordered this product. It’s all in one yet very light.
customer_reviews.author: punpunpun

customer_reviews.title: Great when applied with makeup sponge!
customer_reviews.text: at First I didn’t like this product because it was not a smooth application however I discovered it works great when applied with a makeup sponge!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My favorite product. I don't even use foundation any more ...
customer_reviews.text: My favorite product. I don't even use foundation any more this does such a great job! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Nash

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. Very light moisturizer with a little tint. My issue with ordering online is that 3 out of 4 times they have sent the wrong shade.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Christopher

customer_reviews.title: $10 less than Sephora
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight with decent coverage, some days I just wear this alone....making my skin better, will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Gordon Burson

customer_reviews.title: Great product !
customer_reviews.text: Love this product will be ordering more . Wish darker tints were available
customer_reviews.author: robyn Bertolacci

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I used Sephora's shade-matching feature to find the right color. Blends nicely and feels very light.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: Love the product... glad I didn't have to drive to shopping center to get it!
customer_reviews.author: Honey Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Light coverage but I love it for every day and I swear it has improved my skin!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley P.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good for dry skin. However it only provides really light coverage.
customer_reviews.author: Qi

customer_reviews.title: Love the product (have been using it for years)
customer_reviews.text: Love the product (have been using it for years), but I had a fulfillment issue because I ordered Wheat and when it arrived it said Wheat on the outside plastic wrapping but the product itself was Natural (5).
customer_reviews.author: Have Spoon Will Travel

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Don't use it every day, but when I do it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: shanna elkins

customer_reviews.title: WILL be buying again! 😍
customer_reviews.text: Light, even coverage for less cost than Ulta or Sephora. Authentic Bare Minerals product!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Eversull

customer_reviews.title: Double duty
customer_reviews.text: Not only is it a moisturizer, it also works as a coverup. Plus, it has sunscreen.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Willard

customer_reviews.title: Definitely appreciate a bargain
customer_reviews.text: This is a product I normally use. So happy I found it on Amazon...great bargain.
customer_reviews.author: VLD

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for a couple years. It looks natural
customer_reviews.author: Patricia M.

customer_reviews.title: Not too impressed...
customer_reviews.text: Seemed to be really blotchy after just a couple hours and had a bit of an orange tint
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing coverage with a light feel
customer_reviews.text: Amazing coverage with a light feel. Has not made me break out in SUMMER which is a first for any foundation. EVER. And I'm 37!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Even a little Darker is Seamless
customer_reviews.text: I love this! Felt I needed it after catching myself in the mirror trimming my boyfriend’s neck and saw green/pale girl looking back. I ordered a bit darker then normal and it is working perfectly. Doing regular microdermabrasion so my skin looks especially blotchy. It’s a concealer and with a shade above- a bit of a bronzer. This looks excellent, natural and works as a sunscreen. Can wear it at night without my boyfriend having a clue I have any makeup on. Worth the hype.
customer_reviews.author: Viola Champion

customer_reviews.title: Lighter than expected!
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed in this. I looked on bareMinerals website to verify what color cream to order. I have medium neutral olive-toned skin. I’m not super pale, but not super tan. According to their website, I am Wheat 4.5. When it arrived, it was way too light. I have my winter coloring and it’s still too light. Once summer hits, I know I will get more tan and the cream will look even lighter. I have to mix it with a darker color just so I don’t look ghastly. Also the directions say to apply with fingertips, but it looks cakey and terrible if you do that. I use a beautyblender.
customer_reviews.author: Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Great tinted moisturizer!
customer_reviews.text: This product is basically a tinted moisturizer and if you treat it as such then you won't be disappointed! My face was so dry and itchy in in the mornings even with putting on my regular face lotion, I knew I needed something extra. Pairing this with the Bare Minerals face powder really gives me the full coverage of a foundation, no shiny oily look, but my face feels fresh and dewy all day. Not to mention the SPF 30 really helps for anti-aging!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this foundation and I am picky!!! Very light coverage but goes on evenly. Perfect hydration level for all year round. I use it with a brush for application most of the time but it works well spreading with fingers too. Can’t go wrong!
customer_reviews.author: Emily M.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Foundation
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite foundation. Everytime I stray away, try a new foundation to save a few dollars I ens up regretting it. It's light weight, on the less coverage side. I always use Tarte's tape shape concealer to cover any blemishes before applying this. That combo works perfectly to help my skin look flawless no matter what the acne situation is. I also follow the foundation with a mineral veil as it does make the skin just a little shiny.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Great color match and feels great on!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product since it came out. I love the coverage it is light but covers my skin enough for daily use. I use it more than makeup. I only wish it came in a more valuable package I end up having to purchase every 6 weeks. I recommend it all year long.
customer_reviews.author: Malia87

customer_reviews.title: I found a very good match for my skin that blends perfectly
customer_reviews.text: This tinted moisturizer works well for a no make up look, which I prefer as I age. I do need to use concealer on broken veins, but expected that with sheer coverage. I found a very good match for my skin that blends perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: 2Kids

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizing sunscreen that feels good.
customer_reviews.text: This is my go to moisturizing sunscreen. It is very light weight and does not make my face feel greasy or itchy. I have very sensitive skin. I will purchase this again. It evens out your color without looking like makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Fritzy

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I love the rescue remedy! It goes on smooth and helps to hydrate my skin. It is not full coverage which I like. And this is a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany A.

customer_reviews.title: Wish I liked it.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this. It has good coverage and goes on really even. But it makes my skin really oily, and it hasn't helped with reducing breakouts like I had hoped. I missed the return window otherwise I would have returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Tate Family

customer_reviews.title: perfect for frequent re-application throughout the day
customer_reviews.text: I live in AZ and need to re-apply sunscreen every 2 hours, even working in an office all day indoors. This is the perfect texture and sheer tint I can quickly re-apply at my desk and look freshly made up all day.
customer_reviews.author: MelanieP

customer_reviews.title: bareMinerals Complexion Rescue Tinted Hydrating Gel
customer_reviews.text: I went into Ulta and tried this shade and it looked correct. I bought this and it make me look like a ghost. It a good product and its build able for more coverage.
customer_reviews.author: cshopusedstuffonline

customer_reviews.title: Love the product, not the shades
customer_reviews.text: I'm disappointed that the shades all seen to be too yellow for me- the vanilla used to be more cool( pink) so I tried the birch and it IS a bit lighter but still yellow
customer_reviews.author: Lisa L. Young

customer_reviews.title: Only foundation that doesn't clog pores like others
customer_reviews.text: The pores on my skin clog super easily and this is the only foundation type product that doesn't heavily clog my pores. It looks natural and is very lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Keto Munchies

customer_reviews.title: Love this new bare skinned fecundation
customer_reviews.text: Been using BM for 10+ years. Love this new bare skinned fecundation, looks so natural and gives decent coverage
customer_reviews.author: Tracey B

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff for days that I don’t want a ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff for days that I don’t want a ton of makeup on my face. A little bit goes a long way. Not the best in humidity though. I have very oily skin and it gets very slick when I’m in humid temps. Great in dryer climates.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great moisturizer!
customer_reviews.text: Love this moisturizer! The tint is great for evening out skin tone while moisturizing your skin. It’s a little too heavy of a moisturizer for summer but is excellent for winter time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: bareMinerals Complexion Rescue Tinted Hydrating Gel Cream SPF 30, Birch 1.5, 1.18 Ounce
product_meta.description: Color:Birch| Size:1.18 Fluid OunceA clean, multitasking tinted moisturizer that combines hydrating skincare benefits. The creamy, lightweight formula blends effortlessly onto skin. Its your go-to formula for natural-looking coverage and everyday protection.
